scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 usersRepository='{}' ts-node --transpile-only src/index.ts
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production usersRepository='{}' npm run build && node ./dist/bundle.js
scripts.start:multi: cross-env MODE=cluster usersRepository='{}' NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 ts-node src/index.ts
